title: Bullish Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - KLIC - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Kulicke & Soffa Industries, Inc. (Symbol: KLIC) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $21.62, changing hands as high as $21.93 per share. Kulicke & Soffa Industries, Inc. shares are currently trading up about 3.2% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of KLIC shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
